overview:
Peter Daley is a Vice President of Union Square Advisors. Prior to joining Union Square, Mr. Daley was an Equity Research Analyst at Rutberg & Company, where he led the firmâ€™s coverage of the Digital Media sector and was a regularly featured speaker at industry events such as CES, NAB, and CTIA.

Formerly, Mr. Daley was Vice President of Marketing and board director for Clearbridge, a provider of on-demand procurement control software, where he was responsible for new product initiatives and sales channel development.

Before joining Clearbridge, Mr. Daley founded web-based enterprise software company BuildPoint, where he served as CFO, EVP of Strategy, and board director. Prior to founding BuildPoint, Mr. Daley was a Corporate Finance Analyst in the Technology Group at Credit Suisse First Boston.
